entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

entry.title: typora-vue-theme主题介绍
entry.content:
how to start the service

install python dependencies

pip install -U -r requirements.txtexport PATH=~/.local/bin/:$PATH

setup environment, or use my .env

cp .env.prod .env# orcp /tmp/.env .env

start the service, you might need to update port to avoid conflict

uvicorn app.app:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8002

when testing remotely

uvicorn app.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8002

calling api remotely to simulate an front-end

# follow the above steps to start the service, you need to adjust certain variables like port and session id and otp_code to your own case when running the following tests.# sign in otpstart python3 interactive console:import requestsr = requests.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/sign_in_otp', json={'phone_number': '13912345678'})r.content# confirm otpr = requests.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/confirm_otp', json={'otp_code': '53164', 'session_id': '6ec3997d549dc36e39be883f9ce59884bd9a8fbe'})r.contentheaders = {'Authorization': 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6ImJhNmMxNjdlODg1ZWE0YmU4MjUyZmIwMWM2MWZjNTU0MzkwODlmMzg5ZWUxYjA1OTJmYzhjNGY0MTcxOTY0MDMiLCJleHAiOjE3Mzg3NzA2NzB9.q3JnU6OrcPKwzZ4coxURUljcbbWrWWrsyjQZ8oOf5dU'}r = requests.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/user_info', json={'first_name': 'abc', 'last_name': 'def'}, headers=headers)r.contentr = requests.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/price', json={'seller': 'target', 'upc':'673419376730'})r.content
